DOC.detailed_description: Each woman receive experimental therapy acupuncture twice week five week complete packet validate questionnaires/surveys 1st visit person week 6 mail . The acupuncture session include : - An Initial Evaluation certify acupuncturist take - History include : chief complaint , diet , level diaphoresis , water intake , digestive function , menstrual cycling , sleep habit , overall mood - Physical Exam : inspection tongue palpation pulse - 25 minute rest quietly acupuncture needle place - Needle usage : from8 20 needle typically use , average 14 per session - Needles typically place scalp , low abdomen , elbow knee Subsequent Sessions ( 9 ) certify acupuncturist - 25 minute , twice weekly , 5 week = total 10 session - Needle usage = 8-20 , average 14 per session - Typically place scalp , low abdomen , elbow knees The questionnaires/surveys include question : - Sexual desire , arousal , lubrication , orgasm , satisfaction pain - General physical health - General emotional psychological health - Social relationship
